title: Unknown academic proposed as Italy's new PM
text:
Unknown academic proposed as Italy's new PM 5:48pm BST - 02:00
Italy's anti-establishment 5-Star Movement and the far-right League on Monday proposed Giuseppe Conte, a little-known law professor, as prime minister to lead their big-spending coalition government.
Italy's anti-establishment 5-Star Movement and the far-right League on Monday proposed Giuseppe Conte, a little-known law professor, as prime minister to lead their big-spending coalition government. //reut.rs/2ICZtmY
